column7: Leverage via NEPA and related legal posture; sequencing may include NOI/MOA approach.
Consensus packet and credibility on benthic recovery, oyster/seagrass impacts.
Economic and cultural credibility; fisheries impacts narrative.
Shoreline and water quality concerns; useful messengers in public forums.
Earned media can shape urgency and normalize alternatives.
Can provide cover or friction depending on Port alignment.
